blogPost.excerpt:
Lil Nas X’s “MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name)” is his latest hit, with the music video racking up over 32 million views since it dropped on Friday. Produced by Roy Lenzo, Omer Fedi, and Take a Daytrip, the song first popped up as an Instagram snippet and later appeared in a Logitech Super Bowl commercial. It is the second single from his upcoming album of the same name, which is expected to drop this summer.

“MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name)” is inspired by a former relationship, with lyrics that reflect the artist’s journey to accepting his sexuality.

Read more on Genius: https://genius.com/a/lil-nas-x-breaks-down-the-meaning-of-montero-call-me-by-your-name
Read all the lyrics to "Montero (Call Me By Your Name)" on Genius: https://genius.com/Lil-nas-x-montero-call-me-by-your-name-lyrics
Watch the official music video for "Montero (Call Me By Your Name)": https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6swmTBVI83k

Subscribe to Genius: http://bit.ly/2cNV6nz
Genius on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Genius
Genius on Instagram: http://instagram.com/genius
Genius on Facebook: https://facebook.com/Geniusdotcom
http://genius.com

#lilnasx #monterocallmebyyourname #verified

Produced by Roy Lenzo, Omer Fedi, and Take a Daytrip, the song first popped up as an Instagram snippet and later appeared in a Logitech Super Bowl commercial. It is the second single from his upcoming album of the same name, which is expected to drop this summer.

localize.title: Lil Nas X "Montero (Call Me By Your Name)" 官方歌词及含义｜已验证
localize.description:
Lil Nas X的 "MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) "是他的最新主打歌，自上周五发布以来，这支MV的点击率超过3200万。这首歌由Roy Lenzo、Omer Fedi和Take a Daytrip制作，先是作为Instagram的片段出现，随后出现在罗技超级碗的广告中。这首歌是他即将发行的同名专辑中的第二首单曲，预计将于今年夏天推出。

"MONTERO (Call Me By Your Name) "的灵感来自于前一段感情，歌词反映了艺术家接受自己性取向的历程。

阅读更多内容请访问Genius：https://genius.com/a/lil-nas-x-breaks-down-the-meaning-of-montero-call-me-by-your-name

在Genius上阅读 "Montero (Call Me By Your Name) "的所有歌词：https://genius.com/Lil-nas-x-montero-call-me-by-your-name-lyrics。

观看 "Montero (Call Me By Your Name) "的官方MV：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6swmTBVI83k。

previous.excerpt:
While the Clippers are said to be interested in DeMarcus Cousins, the Los Angeles Lakers and Brooklyn Nets both added their own big men in the buyout market over the weekend. LaMarcus Aldridge signed with the Nets and will join forces with James Harden, Kyrie Irving, and Kevin Durant after the being bought out by the San Antonio Spurs. Meanwhile, Andre Drummond joined LeBron James and the Lakers in LA after his contract was bought out by the Cavs. Frank Vogel said he believed the Lakers got quote, 'a lot better' with the signing. Hear what Skip Bayless and Shannon Sharpe have to say about the Lakers and Nets new additions.

#Undisputed #NBA #AndreDrummond #LaMarcusAldridge #DeMarcusCousins #JamesHarden #KyrieIrving #KevinDurant #LeBron #Lakers #Nets #Clippers

localize.title: 湖人将安德烈-德拉蒙德、阿尔德里奇签到网队后，NBA陷入了 "大麻烦"----------------------NBA
localize.description:
虽然说快船队对德马库斯-考辛斯很感兴趣，但洛杉矶湖人队和布鲁克林篮网队在周末的买断市场上都增加了自己的大个子。拉马库斯-阿尔德里奇与篮网签约，在被圣安东尼奥马刺买断后，他将与詹姆斯-哈登、凯里-欧文和凯文-杜兰特联手。同时，安德烈-德拉蒙德在合同被骑士队买断后，在洛杉矶加入了勒布朗-詹姆斯和湖人队。弗兰克-沃格尔说，他相信湖人在这次签约中得到了报价，"好多了"。听听Skip Bayless和Shannon Sharpe对湖人队和篮网队的新成员有什么看法。

#不争气#NBA #AndreDrummond #LaMarcusAldridge #DeMarcusCousins #JamesHarden #KyrieIrving #KevinDurant #LeBron #Lakers #Nets #Clippers#。

localize.title: 湖人將安德烈-德拉蒙德、阿爾德里奇簽到網隊後，NBA陷入了 "大麻煩"----------------------NBA
localize.description:
雖然說快船隊對德馬庫斯-考辛斯很感興趣，但洛杉磯湖人隊和布魯克林籃網隊在週末的買斷市場上都增加了自己的大個子。拉馬庫斯-阿爾德里奇與籃網簽約，在被聖安東尼奧馬刺買斷後，他將與詹姆斯-哈登、凱里-歐文和凱文-杜蘭特聯手。同時，安德烈-德拉蒙德在合同被騎士隊買斷後，在洛杉磯加入了勒布朗-詹姆斯和湖人隊。弗蘭克-沃格爾說，他相信湖人在這次簽約中得到了報價，"好多了"。聽聽Skip Bayless和Shannon Sharpe對湖人隊和籃網隊的新成員有什麼看法。

#不爭氣#NBA #AndreDrummond #LaMarcusAldridge #DeMarcusCousins #JamesHarden #KyrieIrving #KevinDurant #LeBron #Lakers #Nets #Clippers#。
